item.title: Dustan add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity." -- George Carlin

item.title: Dustan add a quote by Denis Leary
item.description: "I think we should take Iraq and Iran and combine them into one country and call it Irate. All the pissed off people live in one place and get it over with." -- Denis Leary

item.title: Dustan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description:
"Many forms of Government have been tried, and will be tried in this world of sin and woe. No one pretends that democracy is perfect or all-wise. Indeed, it has been said that democracy is the worst form of Government except for all those other forms that have been tried from time to time."
(Speech in the House of Commons, 11 November 1947)" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Dustan add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety." -- Benjamin Franklin
